entry.content:
• News tags:
  • Open Source
  • "Molly O'Connor" excerpt: "Molly attended the Open Source Hardware Documentation Jam this past weekend at NYU."

Molly attended the Open Source Hardware Documentation Jam this past weekend at NYU. The meeting brought together a diverse group of engineers, developers and designers who focused on improving documentation in open source hardware. By adhering to documentation best practices, we hope to increase the potential for collaboration and innovation. http://www.opensourcewarehouse.org/
